pkgmetadata.longdescription: General-Purpose Gradient-Based Optimization // Provides general purpose tools for helping users to implement steepest gradient descent methods for function optimization; for details see Ruder (2016) arXiv:1609.04747v2. Currently, the Steepest 2-Groups Gradient Descent and the Adaptive Moment Estimation (Adam) are the methods implemented. Other methods will be implemented in the future.
